Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: "You follow Watanabe's lead to an emptier spot of the camp."}
{3: 'The children you saw running before are now gathered there, keeping busy among themselves.'}
{3: 'Watanabe slows down his pace, and you are confused about what he is intending.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Hey, what do you guys think about these...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "That's about the right amount... And then it's up to how fast we can act. Or else we'll get discovered.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'Is it because of the "supplier"? I heard from my uncle about some product testing... That\'s why Uncle Watanabe and the others are heading out.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: '...But if you think about it, the supplier also has it pretty rough, having to work at a time like this.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Wait, it should go like this... like this! Twist this, and then... Argh!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "You're right, but don't fold it with so much force! Gently!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'How about it we hang it right outside the entrance? They can see it once they come back...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'And this one too! We can glue this by the gate!'}
{2: 'What are you doing?', 3: '18', 4: '(Approach quietly with Watanabe)', 5: '20'}
{3: 'All the children turn around at the same time, the excitement on their faces barely hidden.'}
{3: 'The little girl is the first one to react. She steadies herself and watches you approach nervously.'}
{3: 'Maybe it is the sound of your footsteps or your wavering shadow that has warned them, but the children immediately notice your presence. They are surprisingly alert.'}
{3: 'They only relax until they realize that it is Watanabe who is heading toward them.'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: 'Uncle Watanabe! Oh, and the supplier!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "Aren't you going on a mission, Uncle Watanabe?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Xiuyong and Deckard deliberately step forward, blocking Ann and the things she is holding in her arms from your view.'}
{3: 'Watanabe acts like he has not noticed what they did, and he crouches to their height with a solemn and respectful expression.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I am, but that is going to take a while to prepare, so I am here to check and see how your mission's going.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Deckard', 3: "...Even so, you should have said something. It's pretty rude to just sneak up on us!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Your enemies won't greet you before they sneak up on you. I'll let you off this time since it's your first mistake, but not a second time, got it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: 'You silly! You should have said, "Yes, Sir!"', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl hiding behind them suddenly speaks, standing on her toes to look at Watanabe between the two boys.'}
{3: "The boys notice Watanabe's gaze shifting, and they move up to keep the girl hidden."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'So, Uncle Watanabe... I mean, Sir! Are you here to give us a new mission, Sir?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deckard', 3: "We have finished mowing and patrolling as you ordered, Sir! We're free to take new missions now!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Smart kids. You're right, I've got a new mission for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe stands and turns to you with a very friendly wink.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'As you know, this is 【kuroname】, our supplier who just arrived.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Your job is simple—', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm heading out for the tests very soon. Once I leave with the adults from the combat team, you're in charge of keeping an eye on our supplier from wandering inside our camp. Understood?", 4: '1'}
{1: '946', 2: 'Hold on, what about our mission?', 3: '57', 4: 'I... am the mission?', 5: '59'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What are you even talking about? The Forsaken never asks a guest in the camp to partake in a mission!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe smiles, slyly.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'More or less. Think of it as a cooperative mission.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe shrugs, smiling slyly.'}
{3: 'His comms ring right after he finishes speaking.'}
{3: 'Watanabe turns away from the three curious children, one of his hands spontaneously petting one of their heads.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: 'Sir, the object the supplier brought is ready.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Patrol Leader', 3: "The tests can begin soon. Please come over if you're available. We're about to leave.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe just gives him a slight nod before ending the conversation. And then he leans in toward the children again with his serious face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you understand your missions, Forsaken reserves?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Children', 3: 'Understood! We will complete our task, Sir!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'Their mannerism is far from the military standard, but the children still sound quite authentic in front of Watanabe.'}
{3: "Watanabe straightens up, patting the children's heads one by one, then he turns to look at you and speaks again."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Simply put, you'll stay here with them when we're out collecting data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They're an energetic bunch. I'm sure you'll keep each other occupied, and I won't have to worry about you wandering in my camp.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not a kid!", 3: '84', 4: 'Are you hiding something here?', 5: '85'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "See, an adult wouldn't have said that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Maybe, maybe not. As your business partner, I simply don't think my supplier needs to go nosing about other people's business.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Stay awake, stay energized, 【kuroname】. Good luck.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We'll be heading out, and I'll try to get it done as soon as possible. I'll see you later.", 4: '1'}
